articles.title: Canada wins gold in rowing women's eight at Tokyo Olympics; U.S. finishes fourth - ESPN Philippines
articles.description: Canada won the rowing women's eight gold medal at the Tokyo Olympics, ending the American dominance in the event.
articles.content:
Canada won the rowing women's eight gold medal at the Tokyo Olympics, storming to an early lead and holding off New Zealand over the final 200 meters on Thursday.
The victory ended American dominanc… [+1489 chars]

articles.title: 'Breaking Bad' actor hospitalized after collapsing on set - Tamil News - IndiaGlitz.com
articles.description: American actor Bob Odenkirk has been hospitalized after he collapsed on the set of his show 'Better Call Saul' in New Mexico.
